page.title: 16RECREATION_SOCIAL CLUB
page.content: The Social club was built two or three years ago and a new kitchen was built on.It was finished early this year.In order to be a member of the social cl- ub you must be a member of a sports team for which there is an annual sub_ scription.The Social Club has a bar, T.V.,pool table,and toilets.The 5s and 3s dominoes league is played by people in the village.The scout hut is a fai_ rly old green hut.It was re-decorated and painted last year.There have been cubs in the village for about 10 years and scouts started 2 or 3 years ago. The waiting list for the cubs grow's all the time now.The Bowling green is the newest place for sport.It was fin_ ished last year.Older people use it mostly.Like other sports at the recreation centre they have a team in a league.
